title: Scripts in Co-op vs.AI
body:
So I've been leveling up this new account in bots for a short while and I have noticed that every few games I will get a player or two on my team that always start with boots and no pots. I was thinking they were new players at first but then I noticed the strikingly similar names of all of them. 

I have very strong suspicions that these are just scripts intended to grind bots until level 30 in order to sell accounts, which I'm faaaairly sure isn't allowed by League's Terms of Service.

The names of bots I have seen in game so far are as follows:
[REDACTED]

Every bot I've seen thus far has had either the [REDACTED] in the middle of 2 standard names.

replies.body:
Hey there,

I've gone ahead and removed the names and any pertinent info about the tags in said names from your post as the boards are not the correct place to report this.

Your best bet would be to [submit a ticket](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/requests/new) to Player Support with any relevant information you can provide, links to match history, etc. They will forward the information onto the correct team to be looked in to, please remember that you will not receive any information about any punishment that occurs due to privacy concerns.
Apologies. I had no idea where to put this.
